alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:31PM CST until February 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 21.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 21.8 Fri 6 pm CST 20.6 20.0 19.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 930 AM CST.
